inclusion.criterion: complaint of hematuria or urinary retention
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to consent to the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of anticoagulants (warfarin, heparin, DOACs, etc.)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: known coagulopathy (genetic bleeding disorders, acquired deficiencies)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: known or history of thrombosis/thromboembolism (retinal vein/artery occlusion, deep vein thrombosis, pulmonary embolism)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: cognitive impairment rendering unable to provide informed consent and not having a substitute decision-maker present
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He had severe urethral stricture but was able to pass small catheter through. Urology suggested surgical fixation when stable.
